set.name: DM24-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Attack

property.name: Type
property.value: Star Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Beat Jockey/Red Command Dragon/RexStars

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 3 and if you have summoned another fire creature this turn, you may summon it for an additional 3 less. If you do, this creature attacks this turn if able, and after it attacks, destroy this creature. {STAR EVOLUTION} Put on one of your RexStars or Fire creatures. (When this creature would leave, the top card leaves instead.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this card leaves, untap all your creatures and they get "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. (A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Attack

property.name: Race
property.value: Beat Jockey

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Master Gogogo Gangan Galaxy: If this is the only card in your hand, you may summon this creature for no cost. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature, if you have the fire civilization in your mana zone, draw a card. Then you may discard any number of cards from your hand. For each card discarded in this way, choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks or whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, choose one of the following: ▶ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker" and destroy it: ▶ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 3 or less and destroy it: ▶ Choose one of your opponent's tamaseeds that costs 3 or less and destroy it: ▶ Break one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Very Rare

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Attack

property.name: Race
property.value: Beat Jockey/Specials

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have 4 or more fire creatures in your mana zone, this creature gets "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker". (A creature that has "power attacker +4000" and "double breaker" gets +4000 power while attacking and breaks 2 shields.) ■ Your opponent's creatures can't attack players during the turn they are put. ■ When this creature attacks, it doesn't untap at the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, this turn, the next Beat Jockey you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, discard a card from your hand. If you can't, destroy this creature. ■ Civil Count 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a total of 3 or more fire creatures and/or fire tamaseeds, draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DM24-SD1 Super Strong Deck: Royal Road of Attack

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While battling, this creature gets +2000 power. ■ During your opponent's turn, if your opponent would put a creature in any way except by summoning, your opponent puts that creature into their graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GUARD STRIKE} (When you add this creature from your shield zone to your hand, you may reveal it to your opponent and choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack this turn.) ■ When you put this creature, return one of your shields to your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.
